DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect different dos cisatracurium pretreatment succinylcholine-induced fasciculation postoperative myalgia .
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : To investigate effect different dos cisatracurium pretreatment succinylcholine-induced fasciculation postoperative myalgia . Methods : Ninety patient schedule laparoscopic cholecystectomy equally randomize three group receive pretreatment 0.005 , 0.01 , 0.02 mg/kg cisatracurium , respectively . General anesthesia induce 3.5 min later , train four stimulation monitor 4.5 min later , succinylcholine 1.5 mg/kg inject 5 min later , endotracheal intubation implement 6.5 min later . The side effect cisatracurium , intensity fasciculation , intubate condition , time extent maximal depression twitch time recovery 20 % control value , severity myalgia 24 h postoperatively , serum potassium induction , time endotracheal intubation , 5 min intubation record .
DOC.criteria: American Standards Association ( ASA ) physical status I II patient schedule elective laparoscopic cholecystectomy tracheal intubation require general anesthesia 20 65 year old without acidbase imbalance electrolyte disturbance normal hepatic renal function Patients know hyperkalemia Patients increase intraocular pressure Patients increase intracranial pressure Patients symptom gastroesophageal reflux Patients anticipated airway difficulty Patients malignant fever Patients neuromuscular disease Patients burn crush injury Patients take drug know alter action neuromuscular blocker Patients body mass index exceed 30
